item.title: settings.php: Sample settings.local.php
item.description: <?php $databases['default']['default'] = array ( 'database' => 'yourDB', 'username' => 'yourDBA', 'password' => 'yourDBPASS', 'prefix' => '', 'host' => 'localhost', 'port' => '3306', 'namespace' => 'Drupal\\Core\\Database\\Driver\\mysql', 'driver' => 'mysql', ); EDIT: Updated to reflect new learning in https://ismael.casimpan.com/quicktasks-drupal/post/weird-session-issue/
